name: Mazey Taxi
description:
Help the taxi driver to reach his destination by sliding the tiles in this 15 puzzle inspired game!

This is my first "complete" game, any feedback is welcome!

Programming and Game Design:
Francesco Mori | https://twitter.com/yamanotsume

2D Art and UI:
Sharon Misuraca | https://www.instagram.com/namu_sshi/
That Witch Design | https://thatwitchdesign.wixsite.com/thatwitch
RAFMANIX | https://sites.google.com/view/rafmanix/home

3D Models and Particles:
Synty Studios | https://www.syntystudios.com/
Lorenzo Lucchino | https://sketchfab.com/The_Jester

Music:
Tim Beek | https://timbeek.com/

Tools:
Bézier Path Creator by Sebastian Lague | Bézier Path Creator | Utilities Tools | Unity Asset Store
Unity
